# Inscriptions of Denial (WondArch)
## Overview
**Inscriptions of Denial:** This wondrous architecture places arcane sigils throughout the walls, floors, and ceiling of a stronghold space. They can be as subtle or outlandish as the creator likes. The inscriptions act as a *[[Magic Circle Against Summoning (Spell)|magic circle against summoning]]* for a given stronghold space. 

*Caster Level:* 13th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Magic Circle Against Summoning (Spell)|magic circle against summoning]]; Market Price:* 45,000 gp.

**Source:** Sourceforge Vol. 1 (Ideaware), pg. 3
